Title: Of FOXes and forgetful worms
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier Inc.Age-related cognitive decline is one of the most haunting aspects of human aging. In a recent publication, Coleen Murphy and colleagues (Kaletsky et al., 2016) describe the transcriptional program that maintains youthful function of aging neurons in the nematode worm.
